<a id="class_VisualShaderNodeLinearSceneDepth"></a>

# VisualShaderNodeLinearSceneDepth

**Inherits:** [VisualShaderNode](class_visualshadernode.md) **<** [Resource](class_resource.md) **<** [RefCounted](class_refcounted.md) **<** [Object](class_object.md)

A visual shader node that returns the depth value of the DEPTH_TEXTURE node in a linear space.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

This node can be used in fragment shaders.
